dataset_name: SLBFE registration by country vs manpower level
resource_section: Registration with the SLBFE by Country and Manpower Level-2020
remarks: Dataset contains SLBFE (Sri Lanka Bureau of Foreign Employment) registration statistics by country and manpower level for 2020, showing the distribution of registered workers across different skill levels and countries. Columns include Country, Professional Level (Female/Male), Skilled (Female/Male), Semi Skilled (Domestic HouseKeeping Assistance, Others, Male), Middle Level (Female/Male), Clerical & Related (Female/Male), Low-skilled (Female/Male), and Total. Data includes 50 entries (49 countries plus 'Other') with U.A.E having the highest registrations (10,714), followed by Qatar (9,689), Saudi Arabia (9,407), Kuwait (8,040), and Japan (1,030). The dataset provides a detailed breakdown of workers by gender and skill level for each destination country.
